# Neram Classes - NATA & JEE Paper 2 Coaching
# https://neramclasses.com

## About
Neram Classes is a premier coaching institute for architecture entrance exams in India.
We specialize in NATA (National Aptitude Test in Architecture) and JEE Paper 2 (B.Arch) preparation.

## Key Information
- Location: Tamil Nadu, India
- Founded: 2020
- Languages: English, Tamil, Hindi, Kannada, Malayalam
- Modes: Online and Offline coaching

## Main Offerings
1. NATA Year-Long Coaching - Comprehensive 12-month program
2. NATA Crash Course - Intensive 3-month preparation
3. JEE Paper 2 Coaching - For B.Arch aspirants
4. Free Tools: Cutoff Calculator, College Predictor, Exam Centers

## Free NATA Tools (app.neramclasses.com/tools)
- Cutoff Calculator: Calculate your NATA cutoff score
- College Predictor: Find colleges matching your score
- Exam Center Locator: Find exam centers near you

## Contact
- Website: https://neramclasses.com
- Apply: https://neramclasses.com/apply
- Tools: https://app.neramclasses.com/tools
